<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 16"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Disciple's Breath](/Feats.aspx?ID=1948) <actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 169 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Dragon Disciple](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=56)

**Prerequisites**
[Dragon Disciple Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1940); [_dragon breath_](/Spells.aspx?ID=499) sorcerer bloodline spell

</column>

---

You unleash your breath weapon without spending focus. This has the effects of your [_dragon breath_](/Spells.aspx?ID=499) sorcerer bloodline spell, though it deals 9d6 damage instead of its usual damage, and you don't have to cast it or spend a Focus Point. You can't use Disciple's Breath again for 1d4 rounds.
